txt.en: Half-orc scouting parties prowl the woods surrounding Grimslade, terrorizing the people of that town.\n\nYou should defeat the half-orcs prowling too near the walls of Grimslade.
You have defeated the scouting parties terrorizing the woods near Grimslade.
Half-orc scouting parties prowl the woods surrounding Grimslade, terrorizing the people of that town.
You have defeated the scouting parties terrorizing the woods near Grimslade. It does not bode well that half-orc scouts can be found so near the town....
Half-orc scouting parties can be found prowling the woods surrounding Grimslade in the south-eastern Westfold.\n\nYou should defeat half-orc scouting parties.
